sentences.sContent: He took the unprecedented step of stating that the rumours were false.
sentences.sCn: 他史无前例地声明那些谣言实属子虚乌有。

sentences.sContent: Crime has increased on an unprecedented scale.
sentences.sCn: 犯罪率增幅之大前所未有。

trans.tranCn: 无前例的， 空前的， 前所未闻的
trans.tranOther: never having happened before, or never having happened so much
